messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content:
To work with businesses to increase training, skills and job opportunities and support plans to end poor employment practices.
To support Labour's plans to give the NHS the money it needs and invest to tackle the crisis in social care.
To value our public services and workers, whose rights and pay have been savaged by the Tory Government.
To support Labour plans to build more council and affordable homes over the next five years and to protect tenants rights.
Now the UK has voted to leave the EU, I will lobby the Government to get the best possible deal for North Tyneside.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will create a National Education Service. It will provide universal free school meals for all primary school children.
Labour will support the NHS and invest in social care.
Mary Glindon will support the WASPI pension fight.

issues.brexitEurope: Now the UK has voted to leave the EU, I will lobby the Government to get the best possible deal for North Tyneside.
issues.economy: Worked actively on behalf of thousands of individuals and scores of vital businesses and organisations.
issues.education: Labour will create a National Education Service.
issues.health: Support Labour's plans to give the NHS the money it needs and invest to tackle the crisis in social care.
issues.labourEmployment: To work with businesses to increase training, skills and job opportunities and support plans to end poor employment practices.
issues.socialWelfare: To support Labour plans to build more council and affordable homes over the next five years and to protect tenants rights.

community.content: Worked actively on behalf of thousands of individuals and scores of vital businesses and essential community organisations through her parliamentary work, campaigning for jobs, supporting our families, young people, pensioners, veterans and the disabled.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud and passionate about North Tyneside and my aim to make life better for everyone living here has driven my work in Parliament and in the constituency. I am pleased I have helped thousands of individuals and scores of vital businesses and essential community organisations through my parliamentary work, campaigning for jobs, supporting our families, young people, pensioners, veterans and the disabled.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked actively on behalf of thousands of individuals and scores of vital businesses and essential community organisations.

endorsements.endorsement: Extremely supportive to me and helped to bring business and jobs to the area to boost the local economy.
Mary values voluntary and community involvement in North Tyneside.
I am backing Mary because she speaks up for North Tyneside in Westminster.

examples: To support Labour plans to build more council and affordable homes over the next five years and to protect tenants rights.
Now the UK has voted to leave the EU, I will lobby the Government to get the best possible deal for North Tyneside.
Worked actively on behalf of thousands of individuals and scores of vital businesses and essential community organisations.
I am proud and passionate about North Tyneside and my aim to make life better for everyone living here has driven my work in Parliament and in the constituency.
Worked actively on behalf of thousands of individuals and scores of vital businesses and essential community organisations.
Support Labour's plans to give the NHS the money it needs and invest to tackle the crisis in social care.
Labour will create a National Education Service.

personalStories.story: Worked actively on behalf of thousands of individuals and scores of vital businesses and essential community organisations through her parliamentary work, campaigning for jobs, supporting our families, young people, pensioners, veterans and the disabled.

examples: Norma Redfearn: Extremely supportive to me and helped to bring business and jobs to the area to boost the local economy.
Liz McMullen: Mary values voluntary and community involvement in North Tyneside.
John Marshall: I am backing Mary because she speaks up for North Tyneside in Westminster.
Under the Tories our NHS is being brought to its knees.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Proud and passionate about North Tyneside.
nonPolicyAttributes.family: Thanks to the full support of my family, I have worked actively as your voice in Parliament.

examples: Proud and passionate about North Tyneside and my aim to make life better for everyone living here.
